name: Banking on Stability
title: Strongest Bank Capital Reserves
description: In 2022, the Dominican Republic boasted the highest bank capital to assets ratio in the world at 40.01%. This indicates a robust banking sector capable of withstanding financial shocks.

name: Dangerous Roads Ahead
title: Highest Road Traffic Mortality Rate
description: In 2019, the Dominican Republic recorded the highest mortality rate from road traffic injuries globally, with 64.6 deaths per 100,000 people. This highlights a critical area for safety improvements.
